name: One Minute To Build
description:
Oh, no, a giant dinosaur is attacking the city!

There is no time to waste, we have to build a giant robot to stop it!

We only have one minute to conect every wire. Things can turn out differently depending on how many you can connect before sending the robot to fight...

Controls

Just drag a wire with your mouse to a wire with the same color! (Or symbol)

Credits
  • Game developed by Asdonaur
  • Music by DavidKBD
